message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I think it's a great deal and you'll find it very valuable.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $85. Looking forward to your response.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $90.  This product is truly worth it, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to offer $87. I hope this meets your expectations.
